thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 28 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Esr-REIT Submits Proposal For Proposed Merger Of Viva Industrial Trust And ESR-REIT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Esr-REIT Submits Proposal For Proposed Merger Of Viva Industrial Trust And ESR-REIT
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Esr-Reit:
* REFERS TO BLOOMBERG ARTICLE ON 26 JAN AND VIVA INDUSTRIAL TRUST ANNOUNCEMENT ON 29 JAN REGARDING MERGER WITH VIVA INDUSTRIAL TRUST
* SUBMITTED PROPOSAL FOR PROPOSED MERGER OF ALL VIT‘S STAPLED SECURITIES HELD BY STAPLED SECURITYHOLDERS & ESR-REIT UNITS HELD BY UNITHOLDERS
* ‍POST PROPOSED MERGER, EXPECTS OVERALL ASSET SIZE OF ESR-REIT TO INCREASE TO ABOUT S$3.0 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
